context_bundle.summary: Custom Tauri-based Claude client to replace Electron bloat. WebView2 backend, 10MB vs 300MB, 50MB RAM vs 1GB+.

common_patterns: WebView2 for auth flow - opens claude.ai/login, user does Google OAuth, grab sessionKey cookie after redirect
Tauri window creation: tauri::window::Window for webviews
wry crate for low-level webview/cookie access
JS injection to grab document.cookie after navigation
Store sessionKey in memory or encrypted local storage
known_errors: WebView2 must be installed on Windows (comes with Edge)
Cookie access differs between platforms - test on each
sessionKey rotates on each Google OAuth, not persistent
